summary: During the early Italian Renaissance and the Black Death epidemic, a group of young men and women, seeking refuge in a secluded villa just outside the city of Florence, shares different stories of adultery and forbidden love.
cast: Franco Agostini|Enzo Andronico|Alberto Atenari|Bruna Beani|Antonio Cantafora|Fortunato Cecilia|Marzia Damon|Pupo De Luca|Adriana Facchetti|Riccardo Garrone|Ennio Girolami|Enrico Lazzareschi|Letizia Lehir|Carla Mancini|Maurizio Merli|Gianni Musy|Krista Nell|Memè Perlini|Cristina Perra|Galliano Sbarra|Sergio Serafini|Mauro Vestri|Eleonora Vivaldi|Malisa Longo|Salvatore Baccaro|Adolfo Belletti|Aristide Caporale|Veriano Ginesi|Jess Hahn|Sofia Lusy|Pupita Lea Scuderoni|Luca Sportelli
title: Decameron prohibidísimo
